name: Rich - Rach | Catch the balls challenge
name_original: Rich - Rach | Catch the balls challenge
description:
Rich Rach is a challenge, beat 10 levels of the game to become one of the people who managed to beat the richrach!

the ultimate expirance of a ball catching game, catch all the balls so they don't fall to the lava, if you miss 1 ball - you lose!
